1.0.name: wordpress/wp-scribd-list
1.0.description: Wp-Scribd-List provide you, a list of documents (whit the link to the download page) that you have added on your scribd's profile. You could use this plugin, to manage the download section of your site through Scribd, in web 2.0 style.
